ContentType.name: ContentType
ContentType.Description: A content type is a reusable set of fields you want to apply to certain contents.

Field.name: Id
Field.Description: A unique ID for the Content

Field.name: ParentId
Field.Description: A unique ID for the Content

Field.name: Type
Field.Description: The type of the Node in the Repository

Field.name: TypeIs
Field.Description: The type tree of the Node in the Repository

Field.name: ParentTypeName
Field.Description: Name of the parent content type

Field.name: DisplayName
Field.Description: User friendly name of the content type

Field.name: Description
Field.Description: Longer description of the content type

Field.name: Binary
Field.Description: The content type definition in XML format
